p: Acute toxicity study was conducted on the ethanolic extract of Launaea intybacea (Jacq.) Beauverd (syn. Lactuca runcinata DC.) in 1% gum acacia upon rats ( Devi and Muthu, 2015). Subsequent administration of the extract at dose 2,000 mg/kg body weight of rats for 14 days showed no toxicity effect, and this dose had helped in the reduction of total cholesterol and elevated the HDL level.
